data.title: 15+ Best Google Alternative Search Engines to Use in 2024
data.meta_description: Looking for an alternative search engine to Google? Here are 15+ best alternative search engines you can use instead of Google.
data.text:
Over recent decades, search engines have become an indispensable part of our everyday lives. Today we do not need to gaze through huge books all day to find a single line of information. Thanks to the search engine revolution you can do that in seconds now. Whether in need of an academy or work, we use search engines all the time. They have created a prime industry that shapes every other business and how they operate.

Google is ruling the search engine industry. That does not mean you have to go with the tide. Or can not explore the search engines that can be more promising with your interest and need.

Counting all this, you can use search engines that are niche-focused with increased privacy and business purposes.

In this blog, we will list down 15+ best alternative search engines you can use instead of google.

What to look for when choosing an alternative search engine?

Depending on your personal needs and preferences, you will find out what is the best search engine for you. It would be helpful if you tried out a few first and see which one works best for you. Below there are some things that you can consider when choosing other search engines besides Google:

15+ Best Google Alternative Search Engine

As human nature, we love to explore and try out options. The same goes for search engines. Why hold on to the usual boring one that everybody uses?

So, let's explore search engines other than Google. Below, we are gonna discuss the best alternatives of Google you can use and they are -

Want to know which website builder will be good for your business? Read our in-depth website builders list to choose the one you need.

1. Bing

Bing is one of the top unblocked search engine and the best Google alternative. According to Similarweb, Bing is one of the most visited american search engine. It is owned and operated by Microsoft. First launched in 2009 as a replacement for live search, and since then, it has been a popular search engine with millions of people using it around the globe.

Bing is designed to assist users in finding a wide range of information on the web. This includes everything from images and articles to maps and videos. In general, Bing is great for searching for broadly available information on the internet, such as details about a specific topic or person.

In 2023, Microsoft Introduced an AI-powered Bing chat bot (Co-pilot) in the search engine that can provide more personalized results for users.

Read more How to Use Bing AI?

Features of Bing

2. Yahoo

Yahoo is a web search engine founded in 1994. It is one of the prominent and earliest search engines that provide users with a great search engine experience.

Yahoo is a web services company that offers a variety of products and services, including search, news, finance, sports, and entertainment.

Features of Yahoo

3. DuckDuckGo

DuckDuckGo is one of the best search engines you can use instead of any leading search engines for privacy. Its prime appeal is to give you search privacy. It does not track or collect user data and aims to protect users' online privacy.

Features of DuckDuckGo

Related Read: Best AI Search Engines

4. Ask

Ask is another search search engine. The user performs the search in the form of questions to find relevant results. Users search for information, online content, and websites in this search engine.

Features of Ask

5. AOL

AOL, formerly known as America Online, is another web search engine. In the 1990s and 2000s, it was very popular for its online services. They offer a range of advertising and digital media services today.

Features of AOL

6. Baidu

Baidu is a prominent search engine company in china. The local market of china hugely depends on this search engine. The user experience and interface are similar to Google.

Features of Baidu

7. Yandex

Yandex is a Russia-based search engine. It provides internet-related services and products. Yandex has been praised for being a reliable search engine. It provides accurate and relevant search results. Yandex provides a wide range of services with a user-friendly interface.

Features of Yandex

8. Dogpile

Dogpile is a metasearch engine. It combines search results from multiple search engines and presents them as a single list. It gives the users a comprehensive view of the search results for the query. Dogpile is a comfortable choice for users who wants an easy search engine interface.

Features of Dogpile

9. Excite

Excite is a web portal and search engine. They offer a great search engine experience with features like directory, personalization, email, and news searching.

Features of Excite

10. StartPage

StartPage is a privacy-based Dutch search engine. StartPage gives users to feel protected by not tracking their personal information. Also, they have a clean interface so that anyone can feel welcomed and at home.

Features of StartPage

11. Ecosia

Ecosia is a web search engine that works as one of the well-known search engines. Another impressive thing about Ecosia is they donate 80% of their revenue to environmental causes. They also provide browser extensions on other browsers. And the search is much more secure with Ecosia.

Features of Ecosia

12. Qwant

Qwant is an all-in-one search engine you can use instead of Google. It offers users a variety range of information and services. Also, it preserves the privacy of its users with child safety. Qwant offers its users to integrate with social media.

Features of Qwant

13. Swisscows

Swisscows finds its place in our list of search engine sites. It is a privacy-focused search engine. It provides great search accuracy with multilingual support. They also give users personalize their search engine.

Features of Swisscows

14. Gibiru

Gibiru is a privacy-focused unfilter search engine. It offers users to search anonymously and gives unfiltered search results. Also, the search engine is encrypted and they do not use cookies. Gibiro provides real-time indexing with customizable search settings.

Features of Gibiru

15. Monstercrawler

Monstercrawler is a meta-search engine. They allow their users to search from multiple search engines and provides a comprehensive list from a variety of source. They also offer their users images, news, and job search options. Users can customize their search results by giving the types of websites they want.

Features of Monstercrawler:

16. MetaGer

MetaGer is a German search engine that aims to provide users with high-quality and reliable search results while also protecting their privacy. It is a good Google search replacement. It uses a variety of sources to gather search results, including other search engines and databases, and it does not track users or store their search history.

MetaGer is operated by the German Research Center for Artificial Intelligence (DFKI) and is funded by the Federal Ministry of Education and Research. It is available in German and English, and it can be used to search the web, images, news, and other types of content.

Features of MetaGer

MetaGer is a privacy-focused search engine based in Germany that allows users to search the web anonymously. Some of the features of MetaGer include:

FAQ

What is a search engine?

A search engine is a software operating system that searches the database of the internet and gives results with similar keywords found on websites. People carry out web searches with search engines. When a user enters a search query in the search engine, it runs through all over the sites and returns all the relevant sites with the searched keywords.

Why should I use an alternative search engine to Google?

There are several reasons why one should use a search engine other than Google. Most of the alternative to Google is more niche-focused. They are focused on privacy, customization, personalized searching, region, and so on.

It can be a blessing for a person who wants a niche-specific search engine. You get much accurate topic and results you are looking for.

Do alternative search engines have all the same features as Google?

No, they do not have the same features as Google. They serve different purposes and features. It becomes a great option according to individual preferences whether he/she prefers strong privacy or business in a specific region.

Are alternative search engines as accurate or reliable as Google?

Yes, alternative search engines are as accurate as google or any other leading search engines. Every one of them has a large database that fetches data and presents it to the users with accuracy and relevancy.

Closing Thoughts

There are numerous search engines that you can use instead of Google. Focusing on privacy or business in a specific location purpose, using alternative search engines makes the experience an easy and effective one that one should take or at least try.

We hope our top list of search engines other than Google serves your needs. Please let us know in the comment section below if you have any queries related to Google alternatives search enginge.
